title: Understanding Data Alignment
text: When working with data, how numbers and text are aligned in cells can vary. The alignment is controlled by how the software or table is set up.

title: Right Alignment
text: By default, numbers are typically aligned to the right in data tables. This means they are positioned starting from the right margin of the cell.

title: Key Concept: Right Alignment
text: When numbers are right-aligned, they line up on the right edge of a cell. Consider this related to numerical values appearing neat and consistent in columns.
